/wiki/Issam_Bassou: Issam Bassou ( born 10 October 1998 ) is a Moroccan judoka . He won gold medals at the 2019 African Games and the 2018 African Judo Championships in the men 's -60 kg category .
/wiki/Ahmed_Abelrahman: Ahmed Abelrahman ( born 26 May 1996 ) is an Egyptian judoka . He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro , in the men 's 60 kg . He lost in the first round .
/wiki/Imad_Bassou: Imad Bassou ( born 4 July 1993 ) is a Moroccan judoka . He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro , in the men 's 66 kg .
/wiki/Houd_Zourdani: Houd Zourdani ( born 17 October 1993 ) is an Algerian judoka . He won a gold medal at the 2015 African Judo Championships . He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro , in the men 's 66 kg .
/wiki/Mohamed_Mohyeldin: Mohamed Mohyeldin ( born 1 October 1991 ) is an Egyptian judoka . At the 2016 Summer Olympics he competed in the Men 's -73kg .
/wiki/Mohamed_Abdelaal: Mohamed Abdelaal ( ; born July 23 , 1990 ) is an Egyptian judoka . He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men 's 81 kg event , in which he was eliminated by Khasan Khalmurzaev in the third round . At the Tokyo 2019 World Judo Championship , Mohamed Abdelaal lost in the semi-finals to Israeli Sagi Muki , who went on to win the gold medal after defeating Belgium 's Matthias Casse in the men 's under 81-kg class . After losing his bout , Abdelaal refused to shake his Israeli opponent 's hand . Instead of bowing to his opponent and shaking his hand , as is customary in judo following a match , Abdelaal instead turned abruptly and walked away with his head down . Abdelaal 's poor sportsmanship was reminiscent of the 2016 Rio Olympics , where Egyptian judoka Islam El Shehaby was reprimanded by the International Olympic Committee and sent home from Brazil after refusing to shake the hand of his Israeli opponent , Or Sasson , at the end of their bout in which the Israeli defeated him . Their refusal to shake hands with Israeli opponents had precedent , in actions by another member of Egypt 's team . Egyptian judoka Ramadan Darwish had refused to shake hands with his Israeli opponent Arik Zeevi , another Israeli Olympic bronze medalist , in both the 2011 Judo Grand Slam and the 2012 Judo Grand Prix .
/wiki/Abderrahmane_Benamadi: Abderahmane Benamadi ( born 3 July 1985 ) is an Algerian judoka .
/wiki/Eyale_Le_Beau: Eyale Le Beau ( born 29 January 1989 ) is a Democratic Republic of the Congo judoka . He represented the DRC at the 2018 African Judo Championships , where he won a bronze medal in the men 's -90 kg category . In the 2019 African Judo Championships he came in 5th place . He had also taken part in the 2017 , 2018 , and 2019 World Judo Championships , not winning a medal .
/wiki/Ramadan_Darwish: Ramadan Darwish ( born 29 January 1988 in Gharbia , Egypt ) is an Egyptian judoka .
/wiki/Ly\u00e8s_Bouyacoub: Lyès Bouyacoub ( born 3 April 1983 ) is an Algerian heavyweight judoka who won African Championships in 2014 and 2015 , placing second in 2013 and 2016 . He competed at the 2016 Olympics , but was eliminated in the third round .
/wiki/Faicel_Jaballah: Faicel ( or Faycal ) Jaballah ( ) ( born 1 May 1988 in Nefta , Tunisia ) is a Tunisian judoka . He is 1,96 m tall and weighs 130 kg .
/wiki/Mohamed-Amine_Tayeb: Mohamed-Amine Tayeb ( born 28 September 1985 ) is an Algerian judoka . He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the +100 kg event .
/wiki/Dieudonne_Dolassem: Dieudonne Dolassem ( born 4 September 1979 ) is a Cameroonian judoka . He competed at the 2012 Summer Olympics in the -90 kg event and lost in the first round to Varlam Liparteliani .
